name: Zigs
description:
Stay on the path and roll as far you can! You will roll in four directions! Just tap the screen to change the direction of the ball. Try not to fall off the edges!
Collect diamonds and buy visual upgrades.

Game Features:
- Simple gameplay
- Roll in 4 directions
- Easy control
- Juicy graphics
- 8 different balls
- 4 different paths
Each watched add Give 5 Diamonds !

Buy new ball and path in shop , join race in Leaderboard !
